description.zh-cn: 原中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任农业部部长、中共吉林省委书记、中共重庆市委书记、第十八届中共中央政治局委员。2018年因受贿罪被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A former politician of the People's Republic of China and a former national-level deputy leader. He served as Minister of Agriculture, Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee, Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Party Committee, and a member of the 18th Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party. In 2018, he was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理温家宝的夫人。
description.en: Wife of former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央纪委书记、北京市市长、中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, Mayor of Beijing, and Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在孙政才落马后接任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Sun Zhengcai as Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Party Committee after Sun's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国证监会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记，后因腐败问题被判刑。
description.en: Former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Party Committee, later sentenced for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局常委，后因腐败问题被判刑。
description.en: Former member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, later sentenced for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央书记处书记、中央办公厅主任，后因腐败问题被判刑。
description.en: Former Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat and Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, later sentenced for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局委员、中央军委副主席，在被调查期间因病去世。
description.en: Former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, died of illness during investigation.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局委员、中央军委副主席，后因腐败问题被判刑。
description.en: Former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, later sentenced for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for agriculture and rural economic development, now the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

nodes.id: 天津市第一中级人民法院

zh-cn: 天津市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国天津市的中级人民法院，对孙政才案进行了一审宣判。
description.en: An intermediate people's court in Tianjin, People's Republic of China, which conducted the first-instance trial of Sun Zhengcai's case.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省青岛市的一所大学，孙政才的本科母校。
description.en: A university located in Qingdao, Shandong Province, China, where Sun Zhengcai completed his undergraduate studies.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所大学，孙政才获得博士学位的学校。
description.en: A university located in Beijing, China, where Sun Zhengcai obtained his doctoral degree.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府于2013年倡议并主导的跨国经济带。
description.en: A transnational economic belt initiated and led by the government of the People's Republic of China in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 1980年至1984年在莱阳农学院（现青岛农业大学）农学系学习。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Agronomy at Laiyang Agricultural College (now Qingdao Agricultural University) from 1980 to 1984.

description.zh-cn: 1990年至1997年在中国农业大学以在职研究生身份攻读农学博士学位。
description.en: Pursued a PhD in Agronomy as a part-time postgraduate student at China Agricultural University from 1990 to 1997.

description.zh-cn: 于1988年7月加入中国共产党，2017年9月29日被开除党籍。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Communist Party in July 1988 and was expelled on September 29, 2017.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会

position.en: Secretary-General, Member of the Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 2002年11月至2006年12月，孙政才担任中共北京市委秘书长、市委常委。
description.en: From November 2002 to December 2006, Sun Zhengcai served as Secretary-General and a member of the Standing Committee of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农业部

description.zh-cn: 2006年12月29日至2009年12月26日，孙政才担任中华人民共和国农业部部长。
description.en: From December 29, 2006, to December 26, 2009, Sun Zhengcai served as the Minister of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 2009年11月30日至2012年11月20日，孙政才担任中共吉林省委书记。
description.en: From November 30, 2009, to November 20, 2012, Sun Zhengcai served as the Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 2012年11月15日当选中共中央政治局委员，至2017年9月29日被处分。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee on November 15, 2012, until he was disciplined on September 29, 2017.

relationships.target: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2012年11月20日至2017年7月14日，孙政才担任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: From November 20, 2012, to July 14, 2017, Sun Zhengcai served as the Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Committee of the CPC.

position.en: Secretary-General of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 在刘淇担任中共北京市委书记期间，孙政才任其秘书长。
description.en: Sun Zhengcai served as Secretary-General under Liu Qi when Liu was the Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任国务院总理期间，孙政才任农业部部长。
description.en: Sun Zhengcai served as Minister of Agriculture while Wen Jiabao was the Premier of the State Council.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，孙政才任中央政治局委员。
description.en: Sun Zhengcai served as a member of the Politburo while Xi Jinping was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，孙政才在任北京市委秘书长期间，与时任市长王岐山颇为不睦。
description.en: It was reported that Sun Zhengcai had a poor relationship with then-Mayor Wang Qishan while serving as the Secretary-General of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 据称，温家宝曾大力提拔孙政才，支持其出任农业部长、吉林省委书记，并最终进入政治局。
description.en: It is alleged that Wen Jiabao strongly promoted Sun Zhengcai, supporting his appointments as Minister of Agriculture, Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee, and ultimately his entry into the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 据称，孙政才将北京顺义区价值几十亿的地皮以极低价格输送给时任总理温家宝的夫人张蓓莉，以获得政治支持。
description.en: It is alleged that Sun Zhengcai transferred land in Beijing's Shunyi District worth billions to Zhang Beili, the wife of then-Premier Wen Jiabao, at an extremely low price to gain political support.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 对孙政才进行纪律审查、开展组织谈话，最终导致其被立案审查。
description.en: Conducted a disciplinary review and organizational talks with Sun Zhengcai, which ultimately led to a formal investigation against him.

relationships.source: 天津市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 一审宣判孙政才因受贿罪被判处无期徒刑，剥夺政治权利终身。
description.en: In the first-instance trial, sentenced Sun Zhengcai to life imprisonment and deprived him of political rights for life for the crime of bribery.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九大期间，公开指责孙政才、薄熙来、周永康等人“阴谋篡党夺权”。
description.en: During the 19th CPC National Congress, publicly accused Sun Zhengcai, Bo Xilai, Zhou Yongkang, and others of 'conspiring to usurp the Party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 在孙政才被免职后，陈敏尔接任中共重庆市委书记职务。
description.en: After Sun Zhengcai was removed from office, Chen Min'er took over as Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 评论认为，习近平主导了对孙政才的查处，以清除政治障碍并巩固权力。
description.en: Commentators believe that Xi Jinping led the investigation and removal of Sun Zhengcai to eliminate political obstacles and consolidate power.
